title: £195.00 pw -Studio in Upper Tollington Road, Finsbury Park, Ref: 96
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Upper Tollington Road, Finsbury Park, N4
£195.00 Per Week
Ref: 96

Property Details
We are happy to offer this beautiful and bright studio apartment in Upper Tollington Park, Finsbury Park, N4

The property consists of:
* Beautifully presented double studio flat
* Benefits from wood floors throughout, double bed, fitted kitchen and separate bathroom
* Bright double Studio apartment with a fitted kitchen
* Large Windows overlooking the communal garden
* There is a communal garden and washing machine which is free to use.
* The rent includes gas bills
* Within easy walking distance of Finsbury Park Underground and local shopping amenities. An early viewing is recommended.
